segments.text: How are you wedding plans going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very well . We started organizing everything early to avoid a last minute rush to get things done . The only thing that isn ’ t ready yet is my wedding dress .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The dressmakers said that is would be ready in two weeks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ’ re getting married in three weeks . So that should be ok . So , you ’ Ve prepared the church , catering , transport , hotel-everything .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . We ’ Ve taken care of all of that . We decided not to get married in a church though . Neither of us is very religious .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which hotel will the reception be held at ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The palace hotel they ’ re taking care of the catering , including the wedding cake . I ’ m sure they ’ ll do a good job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , yes . It ’ s and excellent hotel . A friend of mine had her wedding reception there and said it was perfect , though very expensive .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . It will be expensive , but we think it will be worth it . It gives us great peace of mind to know that our reception is in the hands of experienced people .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think you make the right decision .
segments.speaker: S1
